text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActMood
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    EVNevent (occurrence)**Definition:** An act that actually happens (may be an ongoing act or a documentation of a past act).
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActMoodIntent

name: XActMoodIntentEvent
title: x_ActMoodIntentEvent
description: A constraint domain for RMIM design.
